object.name: spell_manastorm
object.desc: This spell is only for debugging!

object.name: spell_returning
object.description: You feel as though you are being turned inside out, suddenly you are elsewhere...
object.desc: When you cast this spell you will immediately teleport to the dungeon entrance.

object.name: spell_kobold_glamour
object.desc: While this spell is active you will look like a kobold, at least to casual inspection. Kobolds - and perhaps other goblinoids - will not attack you on sight. Of course, they will still attack if you attack them, and if you cast this in battle, do not expect them to suddenly be your friend!
object.description: You cast the spell; you do not feel any different, but your hands look green and scaly now, so presumably it worked,

object.name: spell_tongues
object.desc: While this spell is active, you will be able to talk to animals - though they will not necessarily want to talk to you.

object.name: spell_unlock
object.desc: This spell will unlock any door or chest in the Citadel, as long as you have the Moonstone of Rhapsody.

object.name: spell_cancel
object.desc: Cancels any on-going spell you have active.

object.name: spell_merchants_tongue
object.desc: While in effect, the caster's skill at negotiating is enhanced. Goods can be sold for 25% more, and purchased for 25% less at a standard merchant.

object.name: spell_stoneskin
object.desc: While this spell is active, your skin will be hard as stone, protecting you from enemy attack - at least to some degree...

object.name: spell_banish_undead
object.desc: Banishes all undead from the room; they will be no more (anything they are carrying will be lost too).

object.name: spell_divinebreath
object.desc: Blast your foes with divine might! Especially good against undead.

object.name: spell_fire_immunity
object.desc: While active, this spell will protect you from all fire-based damage, including the breath attack of dragons.

object.name: spell_frost_immunity
object.desc: While active, this spell will protect you from all frost-based damage.

object.name: spell_storm_immunity
object.desc: While active, this spell will protect you from all storm-based effects, such as lightning bolt.

object.name: spell_necrotic_immunity
object.desc: While active, this spell will protect you from most of the attacks of undead.

object.name: spell_lore
object.desc: With the spell active, you may be able to gain extra knowledge on things you find.
